about_the_game:
In Haunted: The Chronicles, you play as a group of influencers who are passionate about exploring abandoned locations and want to share their adventures on the "Glitch" platform.

Everything needs to be done from scratch, build your community by filming abandoned sites filled with creatures and other dangers that are more frightening than the next. Solve puzzles and discover the history of the places.

Cooperate to survive and escape safely from these haunted locations.

Whatever you do, don't stay alone for too long.
The threat remains lurking in the shadows...

Equipment:

In Haunted: The Chronicles, you will have access to various tools and gadgets to aid you in your exploration of abandoned places. From flashlights to cameras, your equipment will be essential for documenting your findings and surviving the dangers that await.

Exploration:

The world of Haunted: The Chronicles is full of mysterious and eerie places waiting to be explored. From decrepit old mansions to abandoned asylums, each location is rife with secrets and dangers. Will you have what it takes to uncover the truth and escape with your life?

Puzzle and mechanics:

As you explore each location, you will encounter a variety of puzzles and obstacles to overcome. From deciphering cryptic messages to navigating treacherous terrain, your problem-solving skills will be put to the test. You'll need to use your wits and your equipment to figure out the clues and unravel the mysteries.

Escalating Difficulty:

As you progress through the game, the challenges you face will become increasingly difficult. You'll need to stay on your toes and be prepared for anything. With each new location comes new dangers, puzzles, and creatures, so make sure you're ready for whatever the game throws your way.

Co-op:

Haunted: The Chronicles can be played solo or with up to three other players in co-op mode. You and your friends have to work together to solve puzzles, fend off creatures, and escape each location. Cooperation and communication are key to survival, so make sure you have each other's backs.
